BiFuncLib

BiFuncLib's documentation

BiFuncLib is a Python package that aggregates multiple biclustering methods mainly for functional data.

Methods and Main FunctionsÂ¶

In this section, we present the methods included in the package and their corresponding functions. For in-depth methodological details, please refer to the cited literature; our focus here is on function design, outputs, and visualization.

Each method comprises three modules: simulated data, model construction, and visualization. We provide detailed explanations of the functions within each module, along with their usage and outputs, on the corresponding method page.
